author: Unity
description:
Cinemachine 3.1 offers a full range of camera templates you can use straight out of the box. This video covers Cinemachine 3.1 basics and the types of cameras you can use, including the Follow Camera, Third Person Aim extension, FreeLook Camera, Spline Dolly, Sequencer Camera, and more.

This is the first video in our five-part series on Cinemachine. Watch the entire series here: https://on.unity.com/CinemachineTutorials

Links: 
Unity Warehouse: http://on.unity.com/3dEnvironment

Cinemachine documentation: https://on.unity.com/CinemachineDoc

#unity #unitylearn #cinemachine

Time Stamps: 

00:00 Introduction
00:38 Cinemachine series introduction
01:08 How Cinemachine works
02:33 Create a Cinemachine camera
06:10 Types of Cinemachine cameras
10:53 Cinemachine blends
12:32 Custom blends
13:29 Blend hints
14:19 Sequencer camera
16:57 State driven camera
title: Types of Cinemachine Cameras
